meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by an exanthem.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with an exanthematous rash.
meanings.sent2: The exanthematous skin condition caused red spots to appear.
meanings.sent3: The exanthematous outbreak at the school led to many absences.
meanings.sent4: Her exanthematous symptoms spread like wildfire through the community.
meanings.sent5: The exanthematous appearance of the virus under the microscope was alarming.

meanings.definition: Having the nature of an exanthema.
meanings.sent1: The exanthematous reaction was visible on his arms.
meanings.sent2: The doctor described the patient's condition as exanthematous.
meanings.sent3: The exanthematous reaction to the medication surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her exanthematous skin glowed under the sun's rays.
meanings.sent5: The exanthematous appearance of the flower petals was beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The child's exanthematous fever worried the parents.
meanings.sent2: The exanthematous patient was isolated to prevent spreading the disease.
meanings.sent3: The exanthematous outbreak in the city caused a panic.
meanings.sent4: Her exanthematous condition improved after taking the prescribed medication.
meanings.sent5: The exanthematous marks on his skin were fading slowly.
